name: Last Year (itch)
description:
A passion project, Last Year

In last year you play as one of two characters. 

The male (default Saki) is an angsty loving pain in the butt doing whatever he feels in life, no plan and no worries.

The female (default Akira) a cute and lovable girl looking for her place in life, at some point she knew what she wanted to do but after an incident she is no longer sure.

The story is about their lives after Akira's incident in their last year of highschool, Saki blames himself for her injury and swears to take care of her for as long as it takes. You'll bear witness to love blossom before your eyes. Follow both perspectives in separate playthroughs as you get the full story and the motives behind the scenes. With several endings and some fun secrets along the way.

Day 1 (v1.0) coming soon

Day 1 will include:

The full first day for both characters.

Fully voiced lines.

All character sprites and backgrounds.

and some secrets.
